links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 1, 1).
maple: G(x):=(-1-x^3)/(-1+x^2+x^3): f[0]:=G(x): for n from 1 to 58 do f[n]:=diff(f[n-1],x) od: x:=0: seq(f[n]/n!,n=1..43); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 27 2009
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[0,1,2]; [n le 3 select I[n] else Self(n-2)+Self(n-3): n in [1..50]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 09 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
